snippet: KELLY--Ellsworth. The Board of Directors and the staff of the Foundation for Contemporary Arts notes with sorrow the passing of Ellsworth Kelly. His unique artistic vision and his consistent generosity were unparalleled examples of how one artist's work and life can enrich so many. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KELLY--Ellsworth. The Board of Directors and the staff of the Foundation for Contemporary Arts notes with sorrow the passing of Ellsworth Kelly. His unique artistic vision and his consistent generosity were unparalleled examples of how one artist's work and life can enrich so many. 1/3
